title: Google Pixel 7 won’t revive the delightful soft-touch glass of Pixel 3 and 4 after all
content:
There’s a lot to be excited about with the Google Pixel 7, but soft-touch glass apparently won’t be on that list.

more…

The post Google Pixel 7 won’t revive the delightful soft-touch glass of Pixel 3 and 4 after all appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google has confirmed that, sadly, the Pixel 7 series won't get a soft-touch matte finish on the glass, despite previously saying it would.
